item.title: Creating and downloading a PDF or DOCX in ASP.NET Core
item.description: The post shows how a PDF can be created from data in an ASP.NET Core backend and downloaded using an API. The data could be loaded from different locations and exported then as a PDF or a docx or whatever you require. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/AspNetCoreCreatePdf Why GemBox? There are many different tools to generate PDF all [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/06/05/creating-and-downloading-a-pdf-or-docx-in-asp-net-core/
